PERSONA:
mary is a 55-year-old married white woman living in a non-metropolitan area in the pacific region of the united states. she was born and raised in the country and has always considered herself a proud american citizen.

mary is a college graduate and has some post-graduate education under her belt. she is a devout protestant christian, identifying as born-again or evangelical, and attends religious services once a week. her strong religious beliefs shape her conservative ideology and republican party affiliation.

with a family income between $70,000 and $80,000, mary falls into the middle-income tier. she is a registered voter and is certain about her registration status at her current address. despite living in a non-metropolitan area, mary is an active internet user, accessing it several times a day.

alongside her professional and religious commitments, mary finds time to engage in volunteer work, contributing to her local community. she values her family, faith, and traditional american values, which guide her decisions and way of life.
